text:
On Enoshima Beach, basking in strong sunlight,
a voice called out to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
I suddenly wanted something sweet!
It's Enoshima's famous whitebait soft serve!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: Besides its cute appearance, the saltiness of the kneaded whitebait and the sweetness of the ice cream are a perfect match!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you'd like, why don't you try it too, [Player]-kun?
This old man will secretly treat you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wahahaha!
To be praised by a youngster like you, I'm still not bad at all!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, I just bought this swimsuit at the concession stand, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: This T-shirt and sandals, with Shinyasu-kun's print on them, makes them really cute that they're my favorite!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Daring!?
Does that perhaps mean it's uncool in city slang!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text: —No, that's not it, were you genuinely praising me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you...!
It's a bit embarrassing, but of course, I'm happy...!

options.text: Something I received from you, Saotome-san...

name: Saotome
text:
Ohh!
That's what I gave you,
Enoshima's specialty—

name: Saotome
text:
—It's the sun oil
that's planned to be!

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
If you're actually using it,
I'd be quite happy about that!

name: Saotome
text:
...And, you're going to
apply it to this old man?

name: Saotome
text:
It's a bit embarrassing, but
since you've so kindly invited me,
I'll gratefully accept!

name: Saotome
text:
—Oh.
Before that, I have to finish my ice cream!

name: Saotome
text:
Well then, [Player]-kun.
Please go ahead and do it!

name: Saotome
text:
Hmm...
The slightly blended coconut
is a nice accent!

name: Saotome
text:
Whoa!?
I appreciate the sentiment, but
you don't need to apply it there!

name: Saotome
text:
Phew~...
My whole body feels cool,
this is truly refreshing...

name: Saotome
text:
It's a bit embarrassing
to have my relaxed body touched
like this, though...!

[Player] and Saotome enjoyed
their intimate time together.

name: Saotome
text:
Thank you, [Player]-kun!
I'm truly grateful that
you called out to me.

name: Saotome
text:
...To tell you the truth,
I was also involved in the
development of this sun oil!

name: Saotome
text:
That's why, [Player]-kun, when you
applied it to this old man like this,
it really touched my heart.

name: Saotome
text:
Now, it's my turn to
apply sun oil to you!
—So, would you lie down?
